мировые боссы desc: Participate in World Bosses event (85 lvl requirement) everyday at 19:00 (GMT+3) to get bonus rewards
Выполняйте ивенты на мосту Варанаса и за: Complete events on the Varanas bridge and earn diamonds
Ежедневно проводите 1 час в игре и получ: Spend 1 hour daily in the game and get gifts for it!
Запустите лаунчер и начните играть: Launch the launcher and start playing
Magic of gods © 2019 Бесплатный русский: Magic of gods © 2019 Free Russian private server of the game Runes Of Magic (Runes of Magic)
Уникальные ивенты desc: Unique server events: Diamond Rush, Seal of the Elements and many others!
feature_8_description: A dreamland where talent is farmed very quickly and easily.
feature_9_description: Double loot from bosses with Santa Hat.
feature_1_description: A huge number of ways to earn diamonds. From completing quests to killing bosses.
feature_2_description: Standard class system, but with fix for non-playable bundles
feature_3_description: Improved cards of monsters, added new ones from bosses, added exchange of cards for diamonds.
feature_4_description: Increased buffs from relationships. Relationships are leveling up many times faster than in the original.
feature_6_description: Changed PVP system, no more one-shots and added reputation system!
group_description: In the group the most recent changes about the server, description of updates, changes, innovations and competitions are being published. Be the first one to see the news!
Сервер предоставляется лишь в качестве о: The server is hosted for informational purposes only and is unofficial.
В данный момент мы не можем получить дан: We are currently unable to receive data from the server.

stats.days_before_open: day until opening |||| days until opening
